ComicInfo.Summary:
The Day the Earth Turned Green: The Leader has obtained a sample of Bruce Banner's gamma irradiated blood and used it to cause a "green flu" that is bringing down the inhabitants of New York City. With Spider-Man and the Avengers after him, Hulk uncovers the fact that the Leader has infected the city's water supply and the disaster is averted.
Unus Unchained: Doc Samson figures out a way to touch the untouchable Unus.
